name: The Edge of Extinction! (Canceled)
blurb: ZOMBIES  ONLINE IS HERE WITH ''THE EDGE OF EXTINCTION'' AND ITS CALLING YOUR NAME! CLICK TO FIND OUT WHAT IT HAS TO SAY! ENJOY!

rewards.reward: Get Access to the Beta release coming soon! Play the game tell your friends and have fun!

Will receive a Backers certificate with their name on it that will give a special thanks to the backer for their much appreciated funds in the development for the video game  It will also be signed by all of the development team. A picture will be shown in the description.

You will get 1 certificate that you can view the prototype version in our reward pics! ,You can also Can send me email to KanesRS@hotmail.com and I will list you name in the credits of the game under the title Special thanks too. For example if your name was Jason Mackrov you would see your name listed in the credits under the headline special thanks to Jason Mackrov,Exc..
Will receive a copy of the video game for Free for windows or mac. That will be priced for sales at $30.\r\nBut the selected backers will receive it for FREE! no charge and no Fee of shipping.
Will receive a free copy of the game, and a Limited edition Tshirt as a token of our apreciation.
Will receive a Custom Tshirt, a certificate, and a free copy of the game for windows and mac.

The backer will recieve 1. tshirt 2 copies of the game for what ever computer that they choose mac/Windows. 1 certificate, and your name listed in the credits! Get to see your name in the credits of the game! COOL HUH?

The backer will recieve 2 copies of the game for either Type of Computer, two custom Tshirts, 1 limited edition Starter pack for the game! Starter pack(Bloody Help) this Pack will contain starting wepons other players wont have and you will giving you an advantage in the game while others are searching for there first wepons as they are rare! you will have already found amo in your bag hunting gear, a wepon and some survival equipment Now you can trash it all and start fresh or get a Kickstart by funding this project! Thanks for your support!

Thanks for chooseing this Reward!\r\nYou will get in return 2copies of the game, 2 cusom Tshirts, 1 certificate, your name int he credits, 1 Bloody help starter kit, and a Players guid and map of the game, You as backers will be the only ones with this map and guid giving you A better advantage!

Want to Se your Face in the game? YOUR ACTUAL FACE! Well now is the chance! Pledge this reward and We will creat a 3D Mesh of your head in the game If you want it to specify on a certian Iteam or character other than the player! We can do so. Lol how would it be to shoot your self as a zombie in the game! Or maybe we can make you a corps on the ground! Any thing even an old Wanted poster!

You can give us any idea for the video game before the completion and we will us your idea in the game. For example if you want a certain zombie model or gun model introduced to the game we will use your idea in the game. But! The idea can not relate to any sexual theme no tabacoo or any drug/ or achol! And it must fit the theme of the game must not be off topic! The idea can be emailed or shipped out to my adress! But Hurry only 30 avalible!

WE WILL FLY YOU DOWN TO OHIO NO EXTRA CHARGE! AND FREE LEMO RIDES AND HOTLE STAYS! \r\n You Will Eat dinner with the development team and watch a movie. Get a better Sneak peak at the game in development by view extra contenet that nobody ealse has seen and has not been released yet. As well as a special tour of our office.Hotel Plane ticket transpertation from airport to hotle dinner meal and cost for movies and every thing i listed will be paid for by the development team. :) no expense to you!\r\nWOW COOL YOU DID IT THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
